title: Peter Thiel Deems Buffett, Dimon, Fink Enemies of Bitcoin
sub_head: The multibillionaire investor says they have a duty to buy the cryptocurrency, whose price hasn’t been rising lately
body:
Silicon Valley venture capitalist and bitcoin investor Peter Thiel lashed out at Warren Buffett, Jamie Dimon and Larry Fink, contending that they constitute a “financial gerontocracy” that conspires to hold down the price of the cryptocurrency.
Mr. Thiel, 54 years old, made the comments Thursday at the Bitcoin 2022 conference in Miami, billed as the nation’s largest. He named the men, who rank among the top investors and most visible executives in the U.S., as “enemies” of bitcoin.
